+  public CompressionInputStream createInputStream(InputStream in)
   throws IOException {

-             new DecompressorStream(in, createDecompressor(),

-             new GzipInputStream(in);

5128a9a453d64bfe1ed978cf9ffed27985eeef36.commitMessage:
HADOOP-4687 Moving src directories on branch


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/hadoop/core/branches/HADOOP-4687/core@776174 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
5128a9a453d64bfe1ed978cf9ffed27985eeef36.diff:
@@ -0,0 +1,8 @@
+  public CompressionInputStream createInputStream(InputStream in) 
+  throws IOException {
+  return (ZlibFactory.isNativeZlibLoaded(conf)) ?
+             new DecompressorStream(in, createDecompressor(),
+                                    conf.getInt("io.file.buffer.size", 
+                                                4*1024)) :
+             new GzipInputStream(in);                                         
+  }
\ No newline at end of file
